Articles.Content:
This SSTO not only can reach orbit and land, it can also land on Mun, Minimus, and then return to Kerbin for a perfect landing in one trip.

This is a video of the Exelion class shuttle I have been building for a very long time. Initially designed as a re-usable SSTO cargo shuttle, a few modifications has turned it into an interstellar SSTO capable of going great distances and breaking orbit of Kerbol.

I eyeballed the whole journey with some help from Mechjeb, so the orbital calculations aren't 100% and a lot of fuel was wasted.

Edited August 25, 2012 by Suzaku
oops, wrong video
Heh, that beats my best spaceplane nice job
Vid not abaiable in germany, due to GEMA (copyrighted music?).
nice one, my space planes dont even get to space, ;P, realy impressed
Can't watch the video at all in Germany, and ProxTube doesn't seem to be able to get around it either X(.
Proxtube seems to be generally dead... I can't watch any Gema blocked videos at all...

Can you post the craft files?

The craft is still a WIP. When I get it to take off from kerbin, land on Mun, land on kerbin, take off from kerbin, land on mun, and then back again I'll post the craft file.

Those of you who can't see the video have you tried using the proxmate plugin if you're using firefox or chrome?
